mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Pp_info (info_name, info_add, info_size, info_allfl, info_fl, info_count, info_upload, info_update, info_delflag, info_option, info_type, info_sell, info_year, info_month, info_deposit, info_comp, info_move) VALUES (#{info_name}, #{info_add}, #{info_size}, #{info_allfl}, #{info_fl}, #{info_count}, #{info_upload}, #{info_update}, #{info_delflag}, #{info_option}, #{info_type}, #{info_sell}, #{info_year}, #{info_month}, #{info_deposit}, #{info_comp}, #{info_move})
